category.name: Change Management
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CM_work_breakdown_relation
preference.preference_description: Defines the relation containing the work breakdown schedules of the change process. Valid Values: Change Manager relation that contains the work breakdown schedules of the change process. It can be any of the following relations: CMHasWorkBreakdown CMHasImpactedItem CMHasSolutionItem CMImplements CMReferences CMHasProblemItem
